title: Chat Bug -- Pings

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Ever since latest patch, when someone pings something, such as XYZ is alive, or XYZ's flash, It appears blank on my chat log, and bugs out.
After the ping, all other pings appear on the one line, and sometimes, removes the chat history entirely.
I've compiled some screen-caps of the issue
https://imgur.com/a/jTWP2

I play on a Mac.

Cheers,
Danrat.

replies.body: I have had the exact same problems. I also play on a Mac, OS Sierra, 10.12.6. Been happening only in this patch.
